== Installation ==

Actually Camiryo have no installation. However it have dependencies.

Firstly install all dependencies and then just unpack Camiryo wherever you want and run it as:

`cd [Camiryo's location]`

`python main.py`



== Dependencies==

Camiryo's dependencies are:

  * [http://www.python.org/ python]

  * [http://www.riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/intro PyQt]
   * For Ubuntu try: `sudo apt-get install pyqt4-dev-tools`
   * For Fedora try: `sudo yum install pyqt4-devel`

  * [http://www.pythonware.com/products/pil/ PIL]

  * [http://www.numpy.org/ Numpy]

  * [http://www.h5py.org/ h5py].

== Unpacking ==
Now Download Camiryo and unpack it wherever you want.

After unpacking just be sure you wrote All satellites and locations on _pat_ file
